channel.title: Mobiles
channel.description:
Hey, My Dad has just come back from Barcelona. He went to the Mobile Convention. I picked up a leaflet saying...The I-Mate,Innovation By Design.By windows mobile!? So, There is a new i-Mate?Has anyone seen it? Also About the I-Phone By Apple? That won't be sold Until June 2007[Thanks Parad0x..]Because it wasn't 3G. Why are all these Computer Makes, Making Phones? Its Just Weird! Btw, Don't try [url=http://www.i-mate.com][u]This[/u][/url] because its a Meeting Up Site..With Lesbians And Shit.. I'll Post some more when i now more. Also, What phones do you have?
-Ollie

item.title: Mobiles
item.dc:creator: @parad0x parad0x_
item.description:
@parad0x wrote:

Also About the I-Phone By Apple? That won't be sold Until early 2008 Or late 2007..Because it wasn't 3G.
June 2007*

item.title: Mobiles

item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

Hey,
My Dad has just come back from Barcelona. He went to the Mobile Convention.
I picked up a leaflet saying…The I-Mate,Innovation By Design.By windows mobile!?
So, There is a new i-Mate?Has anyone seen it?
Also About the I-Phone By Apple? That won’t be sold Until June 2007[Thanks Parad0x…]Because it wasn’t 3G.
Why are all these Computer Makes, Making Phones? Its Just Weird!
Btw, Don’t try This because its a Meeting Up Site…With Lesbians And Shit…
I’ll Post some more when i now more.
Also, What phones do you have?

-Ollie
